penalize.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to punish someone or treat them unfairly
penalize.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Two students were penalized very differently for the same offence.
Women feel professionally penalized for taking time off to raise children.
penalize.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to punish a team or player in sports by giving an advantage to the other team
penalize.translation[0].definitions[1].e: The team was penalized for wasting time.
